english.segment1: You are a jewel, virtue, treasure. Angelic in heart, painting grace.
english.segment2: With every passing moment, I'm falling in love with you.
english.segment3: You're my morning song and evening lullaby. Your kindness is killing me. Your soft words will be my ending.
english.segment4: You are the one I love the most. It's you I'll love forever. You are the one that I adore. With your extraordinary love. I'm finding it so easy. To fall in love with you.
english.segment5: This three-strand cord shall not be broken. If Jesus is the center. And as this ring has no end, Neither shall my love
